description.p: AudacityÂ® is a free, easy-to-use, multi-track audio editor and recorder for Windows, Mac OS X, GNU/Linux and other operating systems. The interface is translated into many languages.

ul.li: Record live audio
Convert tapes and records into digital recordings or CDs
Edit WAV, AIFF, FLAC, MP2, MP3 or Ogg Vorbis sound files
Cut, copy, splice or mix sounds together
Change the speed or pitch of a recording
Apply a wide range of other effects to audio recordings
New Dropout detection feature was introduced
Zooming when working with a mousewheel was improved
A context menu has been introduced for the Vertical Scale
A new Extra menu has been created from consolidating the Ext-Bar and Ext-Command menus
Theme tweaks: Hover and Icon Appearance
A new Zoom Toggle command has been introduced that toggles between two pre-defined user selectable zoom levels
Many bugfixes!! See all of them here https://wiki.audacityteam.org/wiki/Release_Notes_2.2.2/Bugs_Fixed
See the full list of changes at https://wiki.audacityteam.org/wiki/Release_Notes_2.2.2
You can optionally change the colorway of the waveforms displayed in your project
File menu entry File > Save Other was changed to be File > Export
Many bugfixes!! See all of them here https://wiki.audacityteam.org/wiki/Release_Notes_2.2.1/Bugs_Fixed
See the full list of changes at https://wiki.audacityteam.org/wiki/Release_Notes_2.2.1
Four selectable and customizable themes are now provided
The menus are Reorganized
An extended menu bar is now provided
New keyboard commands for working with clips are now in place
Major overhaul to documentation/manual including many new images and streamlined text on landing pages for in-program help
New Logo
New preferences and preference pages
The Esc key now cancels all click-and-drag actions. It also chooses among overlapping mouse click targets, which is especially useful in the Multi-Tool/

Major work on bug fixing. 198 bugs were fixed for 2.2.0, including the problems of incomplete support for macOs Sierra. See all fixed bugs in greater detail at https://wiki.audacityteam.org/wiki/Release_Notes_2.2.0/Bugs_Fixed
